examples.example: 每一代青年都肩负着时代赋予的重任，努力奋斗着。

translate.english: Each generation of youth shoulders the important responsibility entrusted by the times and strives hard.

examples.example: 每一代中华儿女都在为实现中华民族伟大复兴的中国梦而不懈奋斗。

translate.english: Every generation of Chinese people are making unremitting efforts to realize the Chinese Dream of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation.

examples.example: 每一代科学家都在为推动人类社会的进步贡献着自己的智慧和力量。

translate.english: Every generation of scientists is contributing their wisdom and strength to promoting the progress of human society.
